name: Prunus Economist
description:
--Description--

Grow a farm of Prunus Economists (A previously unknown tree that grows money).

--How To Play--

Hover over money grown on your trees. This money will buy you more money trees, but the cost will go up every time.

Water your trees or else they will get dry. If you don't water for 3 days, the tree will disappear.

Trees will double in size and production on their 5th and 15th day of life.

--Credit--

Made For : My First Game Jam: Winter 2023

SFX Program : JSFXR
